Word.us: A duplicate scan for the same identification number cannot be processed.
Word.kr: 동일한 식별표는 중복 스캔할 수 없습니다
Word.ch: 同一识别表不能重复扫描
Word.es: No puede realizar escaneo repetido con misma etiqueta de identificación

Word.us: After displaying PONO for GI, display in detail.
Word.ch: 先查询要出库的订单号码后再进行详细查询
Word.es: Consulta detalle después de buscar PONO que va a salir

Word.us: After selecting the material number to scrap, display in detail.
Word.ch: 请先选择废弃品号后再查询

Word.us: After setting the storage location items, click on the save button.
Word.kr: Storage Location 항목을 설정 후 저장버튼을 클릭하세요
Word.ch: 先选择Storage Location后点击保存按钮进行保存
Word.es: Dar click de botón guardar después de configurar artículo de Storage Location
Se han cancelado todos los GI

Word.us: Cannot move to the same loading space.
Word.ch: 不能移动到相同的装载空间
Word.es: No puede mover por mismo lugar de cargo

Word.us: Cannot proceed with loading! LOC ID is blocked for loading.
Word.es: Imposible mover. LOC ID es un usuario carga prohibido

Word.us: Cannot proceed with loading! LOC ID is not registered.
Word.kr: 적재불가! 등록되지 않은 LOC ID 입니다.
Word.ch: 装载失败，未登陆的location 代码 或 LOCATION状态禁止.
Word.es: Imposible mover. LOC ID no ha registrado.

Word.us: Cannot transfer! This LOC ID is impossible to transfer.
Word.ch: 不能移动,本Location Id 不得移动
Word.es: No es posible mover! Es imposible ID de LOC para mover

Word.us: cases of data are displayed. Enter the material number and quantity to transfer.
Word.kr: 건의 데이터가 조회되었습니다. 이동할 품번과 수량을 입력하세요
Word.ch: 条数据查询成功，请输入移动的品号和数量
Word.es: Aparece unos caso de datos，Favor de ingresar cantidad y numero de material

Word.us: Change, fixed locations cannot be loaded together.
Word.kr: 변동, 고정 Location은 함께 적재 할 수 없습니다.
Word.ch: 变动,固定Location不能一起装载.
Word.es: No puede cargar con locación de fijo y cambio.

Word.us: Could not transfer to the server.
Define the storage location in the environment setting first.
Word.ch: 环境设置中请先设置Storage Location
Word.es: Primero configurar storage location en configuración (preferencias

Word.us: Denter the material number to display.
Word.es: Denter the material number to display.

Word.us: Disconnected from the server! Try to connect again!!!
Word.kr: 서버와 연결이 끊어졌습니다. 다시 연결을 시도해주세요!!!
Word.ch: 意外终止了和服务器的连接，请重新连接!!!
Word.es: No tiene conexión con servidor. Favor de intentar otra vez!

Word.us: Display the information to process first
Word.es: Consulta primero información que va a tratar

Word.ch: 正在查询出库详细信息

Word.es: Mostrando información detallada del pedido GI.

Word.us: Displaying the inventory information of the material number for scrap
Word.ch: 正在查询废弃对象品号的库存信息
Word.es: Buscando informacion de inventario de numero de articulo de objeto de desecho

Word.us: Do you delete the identification tag?
Word.es: Favor de eliminar nada más una etiqueta de identificación？

Word.us: Do you want to enter the total quantity ?
Word.ch: 要输入全体出库的数量吗?
Word.es: Desea ingresar total cantidad de salida?

Word.us: Do you want to paste the label on the PLT? (If you select No, the BOX label will be printed!)
Word.kr: 출력할 식별표가 PLT 부착용인가요? (아니오를 선택하시면 PVC용이 출력됩니다!）
Word.ch: 打印的识别表要粘贴到PLT上吗? (选择否的话将打印BOX用识别表!)
Word.es: ¿Quiere pegar la etiqueta en el PLT? (Si selecciona No, se imprimirá la etiqueta BOX!)

Word.us: Enter the LOC ID to be received after scrap cancel
Word.ch: 废弃取消后，请先输入要入库的LOC ID
Word.es: Ingresa LOC ID que va a entrar despues de cancelar desecho

Word.us: Enter the location ID for material transfer.
Word.kr: 이동할 자재의 Location ID 를 입력하세요
Word.ch: 请输入移动的资材Location ID
Word.es: Ingresar Location ID de material lo que va a mover

Word.us: Enter the location ID to move.
Word.ch: 请输入移动的资材Location ID

Word.us: Enter the material number to display.
Word.es: Favor de ingresar número de articulo de consulta

Word.us: Enter the material number to display. The material number should be more than 5 digits.
Word.ch: 请输入要查询的品号，品号位数应大于5位
Word.es: Ingresar número de articulo a consultar. Número de articulo debe ser más grande que 5 dígitos

Word.us: Enter the quantity of material transfer first.
Word.ch: 请先输入移动的资材数量
Word.es: Ingresar primero cantidad de traslado de material lo que va a mover

Word.us: Enter the quantity of the materials for GI first.
Word.ch: 输入要出库的资材出库数量
Word.es: Ingresa primero cantidad de salida de material que va a salir

Word.us: Enter the server IP and server port first in the environment setting.
Word.kr: 환경설정에서 먼저 서버 IP 및 서버 PORT를 입력하여 주세요
Word.ch: 先在环境设置中输入服务器IP以及服务器端口号
Word.es: Primero ingresa servidor de puerto y servidor de IP en configuración (preferencias)

Word.us: Erro: Duplicate scan is not allowed.

Word.ch: 输入数量中发生了错误

Word.us: GI quantity shall not exceed picking quantity
Word.ch: 出库数量不得超过指示数量
Word.es: Cantidad de salida no puede exceder cantidad de indicacion

Word.us: No exit picking details, please check the picking details first
Word.kr: 조회된 출고지시상세 정보가 없습니다. 출고지시상세를 먼저 조회하세요
Word.ch: 无出库指示详细信息，请先查询出库指示详细内容
Word.es: No tiene informacion detalle de indicacion de salida consultado. Consulta primero detalle de indicacion de salida

Word.us: Please check the information you want to process first
Word.ch: 请先查询要处理的信息
Word.es: Consulta primero informacion que va a tratar

Word.us: Please enter the material number to query.
Word.es: Ingresar numero de producto para consultar.

Word.us: Please enter the material number to query. The number of digits of the material number should be greater than 5 digits
Word.ch: 请输入要查询的品号，品号位数应大于5位
Word.es: Ingresar numero de producto más de 5 dígitos para consultar

Word.us: Please enter the quantity to issue first
Word.ch: 请先输入要发行的数量

Word.us: Please scan the Idn' Label barcode first.
Word.es: Prmiero escandir a código de barras de etiqueta de identificación

Word.us: Please scan the LOC ID first.

Word.es: Ha procesado a número de articulo:

Word.us: Receiving from the server has been failed.
Scrap cancel quantity cannot exceed the inventory quantity.
Word.kr: 폐기 취소 수량은 재고 수량을 초과할 수 없습니다
Word.ch: 废弃取消数量不得超过在库数量
Word.es: Cancelación cantidad no puede exceder inventario.

Word.us: Scrap quantity cannot exceed the inventory quantity.
Word.ch: 废弃数量不得超过在库数量
Word.es: Cantidad de desecho no puede exceder cantidad de inventario.

Word.us: Select the ERP no. to display.
Select the item number you want to cancel!
Word.ch: 请先选择废弃取消品号
Word.es: Seleccionar numero de articulo que cancelar desecho!

Word.us: Select the material number to scrap.!
Select the work order (supplying S/L) to display in detail.
Word.ch: 请选择要查询的作业指示(出库处)!
Word.es: Seleccionar empresa de salida para consultar detalle!

Word.us: Since this information has been saved already, GI is processed when all the items are processed with GI.
Word.kr: 이 정보는 이미 저장되었으므로, 모든 항목이 출고될 때 출고된다.
Word.ch: 这笔信息已保存，当BARCD齐全后出库
Word.es: Esta informacion ya ha guardado, cuando sale todos los articulos va a salir

Word.us: Subcontracting GI must select all the picking quantity.
Word.kr: 유상외상출고는 지시수량에 따라 모두 출고하셔야 출고작업이 가능합니다
Word.ch: 有偿赊给出库需按照指示数量全部出库才能进行出库作业
Word.es: Subcontratación GI debe seleccionar toda cantidad recogida.
Exito verificación de adecuación de locación

Word.us: The identification number has been entered successfully.
Word.es: Ha ingresado a código de barras de etiqueta de identificación exitosamente

Word.us: The number of prints must not exceed the number of good products
Word.ch: 打印数量不得超过良品数量
Word.es: Cantidad edicion no puede exceder cantidad buena

Word.us: The printed quantity cannot exceed the GI quantity
Word.kr: 출력 수량이 출고 수량을 초과할 수 없습니다.
Word.ch: 打印数量不得超过出库数量
Word.es: Impresa cantidad no puede superar GI

Word.us: The queried information does not exist. Enter the location ID you want to move first
Word.kr: 조회된 재고가 없습니다. 이동할 재고의 Location ID 를 먼저 입력하세요
Word.ch: 查询的在库信息不存在. 请先输入要移动的在库location ID
Word.es: No tiene inventario consultado. Ingresar primero Location ID de inventario que va a mover

Word.us: The scrap has been processed completed.
The selected location is not empty. Please select again.
Word.kr: 선택한 location 이 비어 있지 않으므로 다시 선택하세요.
Word.ch: 所选LOCATION不为空，请重新选择
Word.es: Locación seleccionado no está en vacio. Favor de seleccion nuevo

Word.us: The selected zone can be installed only with a PLT unit. Please check!
Word.kr: 선택한 ZONE은 PLT 단위에 따라 적재만 확인하십시오!
Word.ch: 所选ZONE只能按照PLT单位进行装在请确认!
Word.es: ZONE seleccionado puede instalar solo por unidad. Favor de confirmar!

Word.us: The server environmental setting has been changed. Now, the program will end. Please start again.
Word.kr: 서버 환경설정이 변경되었습니다. 프로그램을 종료합니다. 다시시작하세요
Word.ch: 服务器环境设置已变更，要终止程序，请重新登录
Word.es: Ha cambiado configuración de servidor. Terminar programa. Reinicia

Word.us: The transfer quantity cannot exceed the inventory quantity.
Word.ch: 移动数量不得超过库存数量
Word.es: Cantidad traslado no puede exceder cantidad de inventario

Word.us: The user ID is not correct!
The whole quantity with scrap order should be scrapped.
Word.ch: 需废弃废弃指示的全部数量
Word.es: Tiene que tirar total cantidad que desecho indicado.

Word.us: There is no displayed GI information. Display the GI information first.
Word.kr: 조회된 출고정보가 없습니다. 출고정보를 먼저 조회하세요
Word.ch: 无查询的出库信息，请查询出库信息
Word.es: No tiene información de salida consultado. Consulta primero información de salida

Word.us: There is no displayed GI order. Display GI order first.
Word.kr: 조회된 출고지시가 없습니다. 출고지시를 먼저 조회하세요
Word.ch: 无查询信息，先查询PICKING信息
Word.es: No tiene indicación de salida consultado. Consulta primero indicación de salida

Word.us: There is no displayed information. Display the scrap information first.
Word.kr: 조회된 정보가 없습니다.폐기할 정보를 먼저 조회하세요
Word.ch: 查询的信息不存在.请查询数据后再进行废弃
Word.es: No tiene informacion consultado. Consulta primero informacion que va a desechar.

Word.us: There is no displayed inventory. Enter the location ID to transfer inventory first.
Word.kr: 조회된 재고가 없습니다. 이동할 재고의 Location ID 를 먼저 입력하세요
Word.ch: 查询的在库信息不存在. 请先输入要移动的在库locationID
Word.es: No hay inventarios, Favor de confirmar location ID

Word.us: There is no error in the verification Idn' Label.
Word.es: Tiene error en etiqueta de identificación de verificación

Word.us: There is no existing inventory information.
Word.es: No hay información de inventario actual.

Word.us: There is no GI order information.
Word.es: No hay información de indicación que va a salir

Word.us: There is no inventory information to transfer.
Word.es: No hay información de inventario lo que va a mover

Word.us: There is no picking move data. Transfer first.
Word.kr: 피싱되지 않은 MOVE 데이터가 있으면 먼저 이동하십시오
Word.ch: 有未PICKING MOVE数据,请先移动
Word.es: No hay información PICKING MOVE. Mover primero

Word.us: There is no picking movement inforamtion.
Word.es: No hay información de traslado de PICKING

Word.us: There is no scrap order information.
Word.es: No hay informacion de indicacion para abandonar.

Word.us: This is not an space inappropriate for the master. Will you still proceed with loading?
Word.ch: 基本信息里不存在的空间，确定要装载吗?
Word.es: Espacio incorrecto para master. Desea cargar?

Word.us: Unable to move! This is an unregistered LOC ID.
Word.kr: 이동불가! 등록되지 않은 LOC ID 입니다.
Word.ch: 不能移动，未登陆的Location Id
Word.es: Imposible mover! No ha registrado usuario.

Word.us: Verification completed for the loading space. Click on the trnasfer button to complete the transfer.
Word.ch: 装载空间验证完毕，请点击移动按钮进行移动作业
Word.es: Ya ha verificado de espacio de carga. Dar click de botón de traslado y después completar traslado

Word.us: Will you enter the total GI quantity?
Word.es: Desea ingresar total cantidad de salida?

Word.us: Will you enter the total issued quantity?
Word.ch: 要输入全部出库数量吗？
Word.es: Desea ingresar total cantidad de edición？

Word.us: You can only load the same material number for the selected LOCID.
Word.kr: 선택한 LOCID는 동일 품번만 적재할 수 있습니다.
Word.ch: 所选LOCID只能装载同一品号
Word.es: LOCID seleccionado solo puede cargar mismo número de material

Word.us: You cannot issue more than 4 items!
You cannot to enter more than 12 digits for the Idn' Label barcode.
Word.ch: 识别表条形码输入不得超过12个
Word.es: Código de barras de etiqueta de identificación es imposible ingresar más de 12

Word.us: You do not have access to the screen!
Word.es: No tiene acceso de esta pantalla!

Word.us: You have not entered the customer number or the entry Idn' Label of the line
Word.kr: 행의 입고 식별표 또는 고객 품번이 입력되지 않았습니다.
Word.ch: 行的入库识别表或者顾客品号信息未输入
Word.es: No ha ingresado numero de cliente o etiqueta de identificación de entrada de la linea

Word.us: Error occurred during server time setting!
Word.kr: 서버 시간 설정 중 오류가 발생했습니다!
Word.ch: 服务器时间设置中发生错误!

Word.us: Display the information to process first.
Word.ch: 首先显示要处理的信息。
Word.es: Para ver qué información quiere procesar primero..

Word.us: Will you enter the total issued quantity?
Word.es: Desea ingresar total cantidad de edicion?

Word.us: The printed quantity cannot exceed the GI quantity.
Word.kr: 발행 수량은 GI 수량을 초과할 수 없습니다.
Word.ch: 打印数量不能超过出库数量。
Word.es: Impresa cantidad no puede superar GI.

Word.ch: 显示 出库 详细信息

Word.us: There is no existing inventory information.
Word.es: No hay información existente sobre inventario.

Word.us: Change, fixed locations cannot be loaded together.
Word.kr: 변동, 고정 위치를 함께 로드할 수 없습니다.
Word.ch: 变动，固定位置不能一起加载。
Word.es: Cambio, lugares fijos no se pueden utilizar juntos.
